### VERSION ###
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_MAJOR_VERSION 2)
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_MINOR_VERSION 0)
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_BUILD_VERSION 5)  
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION ${SDL2_IMAGE_MAJOR_VERSION}.${SDL2_IMAGE_MINOR_VERSION}.${SDL2_IMAGE_BUILD_VERSION})

DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE ${3RDPARTY}/SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION})
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_INCLUDE_DIR ${SDL2_IMAGE})
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARY ${SDL2_IMAGE}/${OS}/lib/Release/SDL_image.lib)
DKSET(SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARY_TEMP ${SDL2_IMAGE}/${OS}/lib/Release/SDL_image.lib)


### INSTALL ###
## https://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/release/SDL2_image-2.0.1.zip
## https://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/release/SDL2_image-2.0.5.zip
DKINSTALL(https://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/release/SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION}.zip SDL2_image SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION})

### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${SDL2_IMAGE}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_GIF=ON -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_JPEG=ON -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_PNG=ON -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_WEBP=OFF -DWIN_32=ON -C${DKCMAKE}/DKCache.cmake ${SDL2_IMAGE})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION} SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION} SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)

DKSETPATH(${SDL2_IMAGE}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDL2_DIR=${SDL2} -DSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR=${SDL2}/include -DSDL2_LIBRARY=${SDL2}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/zlibstatic.lib -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR=${TIFF}/libtiff -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${TIFF}/win64 -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR=${PNG} -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${PNG}/win64 -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR=${JPEG} -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${JPEG}/win64 -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR=${GIF} -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${GIF}/win64 -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_WEBP=OFF -DPNG_SHARED=OFF -DPNG_TESTS=OFF -DWIN_64=ON ${SDL2_IMAGE})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION} SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(SDL2_image-${SDL2_IMAGE_VERSION} SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)

DKSETPATH(${SDL2_IMAGE}/${OS})
